snippet: The City of Manchester can enforce an ordinance intended to prevent picketing at funerals by an antigay Kansas church, a federal appeals court ruled on Tuesday.
abstract: Federal appeals court rules city of Manchester, Mo, can enforce an ordinance intended to prevent picketing at funerals by the Westboro Baptist Church, an antigay Kansas church known for protesting at funerals of soldiers.
lead_paragraph: The City of Manchester can enforce an ordinance intended to prevent picketing at funerals by an antigay Kansas church, a federal appeals court ruled on Tuesday.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
